add(Selector<?>, Term) - Method in class org.gag.term.Constructor
Add a Term to the Constructor (Constante, Constructor or Variable) Return a boolean, true if the adding operation has been well executed or false if not

applySubst(Substitution) - Method in class org.gag.node.Node
This method apply the substitution on all of the open nodes of the tree.
applySubst(Substitution) - Method in class org.gag.term.Constructor
